com.betfair.cougar.modules.zipkin.api

Interface ZipkinData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZipkinDataImpl

    public interface ZipkinData
    ZipkinData provides methods used for retrieving the Zipkin data corresponding to a Zipkin span.

    This interface provides methods for retrieving the following data:

  • Trace ID
  • Span ID
  • Parent Span ID
  • Span Name
  • Port
  • Flags

    • All the provided data follows standard Zipkin naming and conventions.

      • getTraceId

        long getTraceId()
        Retrieves the trace ID of the span.

        the trace ID of the span

      • getSpanId

        long getSpanId()
        Retrieves the ID of the span.
        Returns:
        the ID of the span

      • getParentSpanId

        @Nullable
Long getParentSpanId()
        Retrieves the parent span ID of the span (i.e. the ID of the parent span, of which this span is a child of). If this is the root span (i.e. the first span in the chain), the returned value will be null.
        Returns:
        the parent span ID of the span

      • getSpanName

        @Nonnull
String getSpanName()
        Retrieves the name of the span.
        Returns:
        the name of the span

      • getPort

        short getPort()
        Retrieves the port associated with the span (i.e. the port associated with the RPC represented by the span).
        Returns:
        the port associated with the span

      • getFlags

        @Nullable
Long getFlags()
        Retrieves the flags of the span.
        Returns:
        the flags of the span
